channel.title: Changing the name of an item? rep++ for answer
channel.description:
How do I change the name of a Ring?
I know how to change JUST the name, but when I do it, It wont let me wear it..just select it.
rep++ for answer.
Thanks,

item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:

Where is my rep? I answered your question “How to Change the Name”

rephungrymuch…
[/quote]
LOL not really because this guy says rep++ on every topic but never reps anyone…[/quote]

Actually I do…not you…you didn’t answer my question so why would I rep you…

Read full topic

item.source: Changing the name of an item? rep++ for answer

item.title: Changing the name of an item? rep++ for answer
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:15, topic:412868”][quote author=JGX link=topic=514341.msg3736269#msg3736269 date=1314992303]

class9.class

if(itemId == ID) {
go.into.slot = 3;
break;

How do I add to a .class file?
[/quote]

[code=java]
package Client;

public class9 extends RSApplet {
/**
*@Author Imsuperman05
*Finish the rest.
*/
public void go.into.slot(int) {
if(go.into.slot.length == 3) {
addWeapontoSlot = 1;
Message(“You have wielded the item!”);
}
}
[/code][/quote]

Conventions aren’t perfect but that works.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing the name of an item? rep++ for answer

item.title: Changing the name of an item? rep++ for answer
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Add that code above into Class9.java. Then once you compile the compiler will make it into a .class…

Read full topic

item.title: Changing the name of an item? rep++ for answer
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“JGX, post:14, topic:412868”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=514341.msg3736261#msg3736261 date=1314991875]
class9.class

if(itemId == ID) {
go.into.slot = 3;
break;
[/quote]

How do I add to a .class file?[/quote]

package Client;

public class9 extends RSApplet {
/**
*@Author Imsuperman05
*Finish the rest.
*/
public void go.into.slot(int) {
if(go.into.slot.length == 3) {
addWeapontoSlot = 1;
Message("You have wielded the item!");
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: Changing the name of an item? rep++ for answer
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

[quote=“Get Blitz, post:3, topic:412868”]^ Nope

Go into Itemdef.java and find the item id if its not there add something like

case ITEMID:
itemdef.name = "NAME"
break;

it wont be 100% like that but you can find any custom item and just use the name line.[/quote]

No someone said it’s in my class8.java file of my client and I can change names of some items in it, but when I add it it won’t let me wear it.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing the name of an item? rep++ for answer

item.title: Changing the name of an item? rep++ for answer
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

^ Nope

Go into Itemdef.java and find the item id if its not there add something like

case ITEMID:
itemdef.name = "NAME"
break;

it wont be 100% like that but you can find any custom item and just use the name line.

Read full topic
